description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. SPINNR is a unique multiplayer game which utilizes novel gameplay mechanics to pit players against each other in a timed fast paced turn based arena. Players can gain multipliers to increase their point values, as well as use a myriad of powerups to help themselves, or hurt their enemies. Colorful graphics and upbeat audio help to immerse the player in a fun world bathed in glowing neon action.
